summary: Fixed rate limiting issues for reschedule and cancel endpoints. Increased rate limits from 10/5 to 20/10 requests per minute. Added debouncing (500ms) to prevent rapid clicks in BookingDetails component. Fixed date validation to allow today (matching backend after_or_equal:today). Added better error handling for 422 validation errors. Cleared Laravel caches.
current_status: Beauty Booking module testing in progress. Rate limiting and debouncing implemented. Need to apply BookingDetails changes to actual component file in Next.js app. Continue testing reschedule and cancel functionality.
